User Story
As a student
I need to manage my tasks effectively
So that I donâ€™t miss deadlines

Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin)
Given I am on the task manager
When I add a new task
Then it should appear in the pending list


Given a task is pending
When I mark it as complete
Then it should move to the completed list
